verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: By the pen and by that which they (angels) write.
verse.verse_2: You are not, by the grace of your Lord, mad.
verse.verse_3: And certainly, for you there is an endless reward.
verse.verse_4: And undoubtedly, you possess excellent manners.
verse.verse_5: Then now you shall soon see and they shall also see.
verse.verse_6: As to which of you was caught with madness.
verse.verse_7: Undoubtedly, your Lord knows well him who goes astray from His path, and he knows well those who are guided.
verse.verse_8: Therefore hear not the words of the beliers.
verse.verse_9: They desire that anyhow you should be appeased then they too would be appeased.
verse.verse_10: And hear not any such one who is a big swearer the mean.
verse.verse_11: One who taunts a lot, going around with slander?
verse.verse_13: Ill-mannered, and moreover his birth is faulty.
verse.verse_14: This is because he possesses some wealth and children.
verse.verse_15: When Our signs are recited to him, he says 'stories of the ancients'.
verse.verse_16: We shall soon brand upon his swine like snout.
verse.verse_17: Undoubtedly, We have tried them as We tried the owners of the garden when they swore that they would certainly reap their crop in the morning.
verse.verse_18: And they said not 'if Allah please'.
verse.verse_19: Then something going round from your Lord went round it while they were asleep.
verse.verse_20: And in the morning it was as it were fruits plucked.
verse.verse_21: Then they called one another in the morning.
verse.verse_22: Saying, 'go to your fields early in the morning if you are going to reap.'
verse.verse_23: And they went forth early in the morning, whispering together.
verse.verse_24: That no needy person should come in your garden today.
verse.verse_25: And they went forth early in the morning, determined upon their purpose.
verse.verse_26: But when they saw it, they said, 'undoubtedly, we have lost our way.'
verse.verse_27: Nay, rather we have been deprived of everything.
verse.verse_28: The most moderate of them said, "Did I not say to you why do you not glorify Allah?"
verse.verse_29: They said, 'Glory is to our Lord, undoubtedly, we had been unjust.
verse.verse_30: Now one turned towards other reproaching.
verse.verse_31: They said, 'Ah! Woe to us, undoubtedly, we were contumacious.
verse.verse_32: It may be that our Lord will give us in exchange a better than it, we do humbly turn to our Lord.
verse.verse_33: Such is the punishment, and the punishment of the Hereafter is far greater. What a good thing it was, if they knew?
verse.verse_34: Undoubtedly, for the God-fearing, there are Gardens of Bliss with their Lord.
verse.verse_35: Shall We make the Muslims like the culprits?
verse.verse_36: What happened to you? How you judge?
verse.verse_37: Have you any Book wherein you read?
verse.verse_38: That you shall have in it whatever you choose?
verse.verse_39: Or have you some oaths from Us, reaching to the Day of Resurrection that you shall have all that you claim?
verse.verse_40: Ask them which of them is guarantor thereof?
verse.verse_41: Or have they some associates? Let them, then bring their associates, if they are truthful.
verse.verse_42: The day when a leg shall be exposed (the meaning is known to Allah) and they will be called upon to prostrate themselves, they will not be able to do so.
verse.verse_43: Their eyes will be cast down, and humiliation will be covering them, and they were indeed called upon to prostrate themselves in the world when they were sound healthy.
verse.verse_44: So leave him to Me, who belies this word. Soon We shall draw them step by step whence they know not.
verse.verse_45: And I shall grant them respite, undoubtedly, My secret planning is very strong.
verse.verse_46: Or do you ask them a wage so that they are laden with debt?
verse.verse_47: Or is the unseen with them so that they are writing?
verse.verse_48: Therefore with for the command of your Lord and be not as the Man of the Fish when he called out while his heart was choking.
verse.verse_49: Had not the favor of his Lord reached him for his care, he would have surely been cast upon land blamed.
verse.verse_50: Then his Lord chose him and made him of His near ones.
verse.verse_51: And it seems that the infidels with their bad looks will necessarily, stumble you when they hear Quran and they say, 'He is surely faraway from wisdom.'
verse.verse_52: And it is not, but an admonition for the worlds.
